title: Ticket #22: Finishing implementing the BlueGene/P codes
remarks:
Stalled because BGP machine is down for an indeterminate time. The work I have to do requires a real BGP machine and the simulator doesn't cut it.

2009-Feb-06 16:28:15 by psilord:
IBM hasn't seen much demand for HTC computing on Blue Gene yet, so we're deferring the work on this ticket until they do.

2010-Jan-08 16:17:37 by psilord:
Hrm, this is off the radar until some major user shows up and wants to use it. I'm resolving this until then.
creator: psilord
